#id=1
#text=Planting a tree is a very difficult task .
#id=2
#text=First , I went to Walmart or another nursery in the area and pick a tree .
#id=3
#text=When I get to Walmart , I asked the cashier for which trees are easiest to take care because I can not take care of plants very well .
#id=4
#text=Then I figured out whether I want a tree for the sun or shade .
#id=5
#text=When I picked a tree , I took it to the cashier and paid for it .
#id=6
#text=Then I put the tree in the back of my car and went home .
#id=7
#text=Next , when I got home , I took the tree outside and figured out where I wouldput it in the yard .
#id=8
#text=Afterwards , I dug a whole where the tree would go .
#id=9
#text=The hole was the size of the pot of the tree .
#text=Then I pulled the tree out of the pot and put the whole thing in the hole I dug .
#text=Then , I covered the sides with more dirt and put some fertilizer and water around the tree so it set in the ground .
